author: SupraDarky

text:
This is actually a screen capture I did from the Mother (Earthbound Zero) japanese commercial!
Funny thing though, that's not a mushroom cloud haha. That's Mt.Itoi (the mountain in Mother which has the name of the creator of the series) with a circular cloud around it. :)
author: SupraDarky
